guild.description:
This is a place where we post and relentlessly mock garbage that has been posted on Ruqqus by racists Voat users and AHS Reddit trolls
    
This guild is a testament to the fact that while Ruqqus is a free-speech platform, we do not condone or welcome hate, or racism from either end of the spectrum.

"I will defend to the death your right to air your opinion, but I also reserve the right to laugh at you if your opinion is stupid."

post.title: This one's for the retards who keep saying ruqqus is like voat

body: This is what I keep saying. Almost everyone who got banned up until the MDE ban was a far right person and went to Voat or Stormfront. The MDE ban was the first ban of a more moderate right wing sub with many non-far-right users (although it was still relatively far right). The admins have slowly been shaving off more and more of the right wing spectrum and at this point they’re probably halfway to centrists, so more modern alternatives are more moderate right.
body_html: This is what I keep saying. Almost everyone who got banned up until the MDE ban was a far right person and went to Voat or Stormfront. The MDE ban was the first ban of a more moderate right wing sub with many non-far-right users (although it was still relatively far right). The admins have slowly been shaving off more and more of the right wing spectrum and at this point they’re probably halfway to centrists, so more modern alternatives are more moderate right.

body:
I fully agree with you that merely downvoting dissenting opinions is unhelpful, and only causes echo-chambers.

The better option would be to actually respond to posts like the one discussed here, and either disprove them (shouldn't be too hard if it's untrue), or ask for clarifications to maybe see if they may have made an emotional post that they don't even agree with themselves after calming down.
body_html:
I fully agree with you that merely downvoting dissenting opinions is unhelpful, and only causes echo-chambers.

The better option would be to actually respond to posts like the one discussed here, and either disprove them (shouldn't be too hard if it's untrue), or ask for clarifications to maybe see if they may have made an emotional post that they don't even agree with themselves after calming down.

This guild is a testament to the fact that while Ruqqus is a free-speech platform, we do not condone or welcome hate, or racism from either end of the spectrum.

"I will defend to the death your right to air your opinion, but I also reserve the right to laugh at you if your opinion is stupid."
guild.name: Trashcan

post.title: This one's for the retards who keep saying ruqqus is like voat

body: I don't know why, but the image of spez hunching over his computer, making a bunch of fake Ruqqus alts, and spamming out the most racist things he can think of so he can call Ruqqus a hateful platform, deeply amuses me.
body_html: I don't know why, but the image of spez hunching over his computer, making a bunch of fake Ruqqus alts, and spamming out the most racist things he can think of so he can call Ruqqus a hateful platform, deeply amuses me.
